attributes.action: Allow acess to GPs stop telphone treatments
attributes.additional_details: When one has phoned up three days in a row only to be told there are no more telephone appointments for that day phone back tomorrow to make an appointment and a GP will phone you.
attributes.background: To be able to access a GP and not to be spoken to by a receptionist or doctor over a telephone.

rejection.details:
The Government is not responsible for the way individual GPs assess their patients, however we do have a petition open at the moment which asks to review this process, which you might like to sign:

Commission an independent review into GP access
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/598947
